messages.title: Choosing Scotland's future
messages.content: It's a decade since the Scottish Parliament was established. Now is the time to review what the Scottish Parliament has done with its devolved powers, like freezing council tax, cutting business rates, ending tuition fees, reducing prescription charges and introducing free personal care.

issues.governance: Now is the time to review what the Scottish Parliament has done with its devolved powers
issues.health: reducing prescription charges and introducing free personal care

leaflet.personalStatement: The son of a shipyard worker, Chris grew up in Greater Glasgow and currently works for the City Council.

politicalExperience.role: Senior trade union activist with Unison
politicalExperience.achievements: Represents the trade union movement at the highest levels within the SNP.

endorsements.endorsement: I believe that independence is the best option for Scotland. That's why I am supporting Chris Stephens.

images.caption: Chris briefs Deputy First Minister, Nicola Sturgeon, on local issues.
